title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 167.8 - Qualifications of instructional personnel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 167.8 - Qualifications of instructional personnel

State Regulations

Instructional personnel shall: (a) have received an appropriate
bacculaureate or higher degree upon completion of an approved college program; and
(b) have completed educational
preparation at least equal to that required of teachers of equivalent curricula
or courses in public secondary schools. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
167.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
